tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  dispute_description TEXT,
  resolution_deadline TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Timeline (
    timeline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timeline_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    resolution_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Disputes (
    dispute_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dispute_description TEXT,
    parties_involved VARCHAR(200),
    resolution_date DATE,
    resolution_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ConflictTimeline (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    description VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DeadlineManagement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    due_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE DisputeResolution (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dispute_number INT UNIQUE,
    parties_involved VARCHAR(255),
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TimelineEvents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ConflictResolutionLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date DATE,
    log_description TEXT,
    user_id INT
)
